turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey. Got to order a pizza tonight from Luna Bella.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three small pizzas, let's get one with pineapple and anchovies, let's get the fisherman special special for the other one, and for the third one let's have.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Let's get.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: ground beef and onion and bell pepper.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: And I need extra cheese on all of those, as well.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: as a as as a rule.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it, bella luna has a seafood special which has baby shrimp, anchovies, and clams, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, that's good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok and bella luna charges for extra cheese, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have 3 small pizzas with extra cheese, one pineapple and anchovies, 1 seafood special, and 1 with ground beef, onions, and bell peppers, is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah. Three total.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $42, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yep.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: will you be dining in, picking up, or having your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's for pickup.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your receipt will be texted to you and it will be ready for pickup in 25 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hello.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, enjoy your pizza.
